Author: VTMongoose
Text: That seems about right, long as body image and weight isn't the focus, and you aren't avoiding foods because of their calorie content or perceived impact on your weight/body, then yeah it would be ARFID. Lots of people cross over between different types of eating disorders during their lives. I'm more of the mindset at this point that eating disorders really exist on a spectrum. I dipped my feet into all kinds of different disordered behaviors both on the way down into, and on the way out of the valley of my eating disorder. My most orthorexic behaviors were during my recovery, for example.
